Packer Maven Plugin API

Maven plug-in to run Packer commands.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
com.github.codeteapot.maven.plugins.packer
Maven plug-in classes of implemented Packer commands.
com.github.codeteapot.maven.plugins.packer.tools
Maven plug-in tool dependencies available as Plexus components.
com.github.codeteapot.tools.checksum
Tool for checking local directory checksum.
com.github.codeteapot.tools.packer
Tool for running local Packer program.

Maven plug-in to run Packer commands.

It depends on two built-in tool API packages:

  • com.github.codeteapot.tools.checksum
  • com.github.codeteapot.tools.packer

They are accessed through Plexus component bridges.

There is a plug-in abstraction to implement all available Packer commands.
